app.name: Egret Wing
app.description: Egret Wing 2.0 is an IDE for Egret projects. It supports visually creating, editing and managing the GUI in your projects. It also supports TypeScript coding and debugging.

app.name: DragonBones
app.description: DragonBones is an opensource skeleton animation solution for mobile game development.

app.name: Egret Feather
app.description: Egret Feather is a partical _1800, which supports to create kaleidescope effects with different parameter combinations.

app.name: Res Depot
app.description: Res Depot is a visual resource management tool for Egret game, which supports to manage a huge amounts of resources including game content and configuration files with easy and efficiency.

app.name: Texture Merger
app.description: Texture Merger is a texture packaging tool which can merge scattered texture picture to a new big one to improve the game performance.

app.name: Egret Conversion
app.description: Egret Conversion is an useful tool which can easily and efficiently convert Flash to Egret HTML5 project.

app.name: Egret Inspector
app.description: Egret Inspector a plug-in for Chrome developer, which can help visually debug the Egret project.

app.name: Egret VS
app.description: EgretVS is a plug-in for Visual Studio, which can improve the user experience of Egret Engine in VS.

app.name: Egret Android Support
app.description: Egret Android Support is a tool that converts the game developed by Egret engine to Andriod APP.

app.name: Egret IOS Support
app.description: Egret IOS Support is a tool that converts the game develped by Egret engine to ios APP.
